Stefan, any steps? Something strange seen in editor?

No. I did not notice anything wrong in the UI. If I hadn't been checking my logs
periodically, I wouldn't have noticed.
Tom, please check whether we need some action for 3.1

This can happen if a proposal is being inserted while the selection is before
the insertion location - this will not normally occur, since this kind of
proposal gets hidden when the selection is moved before the insertion location. 

Not sure what happened here, but added a guard to protect. Dani, approve for RC2?
I've seen the fix and approve it for 3.1 RC2.
